```{julia}
using Test

t = Topology(2, 6)
addlinks!(t, 2, 0, [[1, 2, 5, 4], [5, 2, 3], [6, 5, 3]])

cl = links(t, 2, 2)
@test length(cl) == 3
@test cl[1] == [2]
@test cl[2] == [1, 3]
@test cl[3] == [2]
```
